summary: Completed comprehensive testing of calendar UI cleanup and reset functionality. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI mostly functional with one calendar range highlighting issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Calendar range highlighting not working - dates are set correctly but CSS classes (trip-range, trip-range-start, trip-range-end) are not being applied to calendar tiles
ui_bugs.details: The tileClassName function in App.js may have a logic issue with date comparison or the calendar cursor state

passed_tests: Admin reset endpoint with wrong confirmation (correctly rejects)
Admin reset endpoint with correct confirmation (works properly)
Dashboard KPIs reset to zeros after reset
Settings tab shows Reset all data section
Reset confirmation input and button present
Calendar renders with custom CSS (no default react-calendar styling leakage)
Trip dates save and display in hint text
Reset flow redirects to dashboard after completion
All backend APIs functional (24/24 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix calendar range highlighting logic in App.js - the tileClassName function for the Calendar component is not applying the trip-range CSS classes correctly. The dates are being saved and displayed in the hint text, but the visual highlighting on calendar tiles is not working.
